setup.title: Welcome to SimpleChat
setup.description: SimpleChat is a pure frontend application with all data stored in your browser. To interact with AI models, you need to configure your own LLM interface.
setup.step1: Step 1: Download and Install LLM Gate
setup.step1Description: LLM Gate is a local LLM API gateway that supports Windows and macOS. It provides SimpleChat with the interface to communicate with AI models.
setup.step2: Step 2: Configure a Model in LLM Gate
setup.step2Description: Open the LLM Gate software and use the 'Quick Add Wizard' to configure your desired AI model. After configuration, return to the home page and copy the model's Base URL.
setup.setupSuccess: Setup successful! You can now start chatting.

api.title: API Settings
api.contextLengthDescription: Controls how many conversation rounds are sent to the AI. Longer context helps AI remember earlier conversations, but consumes more tokens and may exceed the model's context window limit. Start with standard setting.

models.title: Model Management
models.manageDescription: Configure and manage AI models for conversations
models.modelUrlDescription: Model Base URL obtained from LLM Gate software
models.modelNameDescription: Display name only, not used for API calls
models.confirmDeleteDescription: Conversations using this model will switch to the default model.

data.title: Data Management
data.clearAllDataDescription: Delete all conversations and settings. This action cannot be undone.
data.confirmClearAllDescription: This will permanently delete all conversations and settings. This action cannot be undone.

chat.title: Chat
chat.inputPlaceholder: Type a message... (Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line)
chat.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear this conversation?
chat.confirmClearDescription: This will permanently delete all messages in the current conversation. This action cannot be undone.
chat.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?

errors.noModel: No model available, please add a model in settings
